caption:
This photograph captures a scenic sunset view by the ocean. The composition is bathed in the golden hues typical of sunset lighting. The foreground features a slightly rugged coastline with the shore in shadows, consisting of wet sand and some smaller rocks, reflecting the sunlight in a shimmering pattern.

Towards the middle ground, the sea appears restless, with visible waves and frothy water, which adds a dynamic texture to the scene. The water surface gleams under the sunlight, highlighting ripples and small waves.

In the background, the silhouette of a small landmass or headland is visible, accented by the outlines of numerous palm trees against the sky, suggesting a tropical location. This part of the image is darkened into silhouettes due to the strong backlighting from the setting sun. Above this, the sky transitions from a richer, darker color at the top to a lighter, warmer tone towards the horizon.

Overall, the image conveys a peaceful evening at a tropical beach, with an emphasis on the interplay of light and shadow, and a strong silhouette element contributing to its tranquil and picturesque quality.
title: Late afternoon surf at Maliko Bay
